verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:6
verses.text: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:7
verses.text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:8
verses.text: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:9
verses.text: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:10
verses.text: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:11
verses.text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
